properties.areaDesc: Mexico Bay NY to the St. Lawrence River; Sodus Bay to Mexico Bay NY
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 1 at 2:50PM EST until February 3 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...West winds 15 to 25 knots and waves 7 to 10 feet
expected.

* WHERE...The nearshore waters of Lake Ontario from Sodus Bay to
the Saint Lawrence River.

* WHEN...From midnight Sunday night to 6 PM EST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Winds and/or waves will cause hazardous conditions
that could capsize or damage small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT SUNDAY NIGHT TO 6 PM EST MONDAY
